name: Glacia
info: One of the Hoenn League Elite Four, this elegant lady traveled far to hone her Pokémon’s Ice-type moves. She seeks opponents with a fiery passion for battle.

moves.name: Powder Snow
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: X Regen All
moves.effect: Applies the Gradual Healing effect to all allied sync pairs.

moves.name: Attention Here!
moves.effect: Makes opponents target the user for a short time. Raises the Sp. Atk of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Ice Beam
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of leaving the target frozen.

syncMove.name: Glacial Freeze-Dry
syncMove.description: Become Mega Glalie until the end of battle.

passives.name: Snow Shelter
passives.description: Protects the user from damage from a hailstorm.

passives.name: Fortuitous 4
passives.description: Has a chance (50%) of raising one of the user’s following stats by one stat rank at random when an attack move is successful: Attack, Defense, Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, Speed, accuracy, or evasiveness.

grid.bonus: Ice Beam:Hostile Environment 2- Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.
Ice Beam:Move Gauge Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Ice Beam:Move Gauge Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Powder Snow:Hostile Environment 1- Raises the chance of inflicting status conditions with the additional effects of moves.
Powder Snow:Move Gauge Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Powder Snow:Move Gauge Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
X Regen All:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Frost Breath:Move Gauge Refresh 9- Charges the user’s move gauge by one when its move is successful.
Attention Here!:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Attention Here!:Barricade 1- Raises the user’s Sp. Def by 1 stat rank when its move is successful.
Unflappable- Prevents the user from flinching.
Healing Hail 1- Restores the user’s HP whenever its Pokémon takes an action during a hailstorm.
First Aid 4- Restores the user’s HP by approximately 40% of its maximum HP the first time it is in a pinch each battle.
Invigorating Hail 5- Powers up the user’s moves during a hailstorm.
Hasty Hail 2- Quickly charges the move gauge during a hailstorm.
Team Toughen Up 4- Has a chance (50%) of raising the Defense of all allied sync pairs by one stat rank when the user is hit by an attack move.
Ice Shell- The user’s Defense increases 50% during a hailstorm.

moves.name: Frost Breath
moves.effect: Except in certain circumstances, successful hits with this attack become critical hits.

passives.name: Last Word
passives.description: The user uses Explosion immediately before fainting.
